import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import './App.css' import axios from 'axios' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' const Crud = () => { const [allData, setAllData] = useState([]); const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1); const recordPerPage = 5; const lastIndex = currentPage * recordPerPage; const firstIndex = lastIndex - recordPerPage; const records = allData.slice(firstIndex,lastIndex); const npage = Math.ceil(allData.length/recordPerPage); const numbers = [...Array(npage + 1).slice(1)]; useEffect(()=>{ axios.get('http://localhost:8000/list') .then(result => setAllData(result.data)) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) },[]) console.log(allData) const prePage = () =>{ } return (<>
Manage Employees
{ allData.map((d)=>( )) }
Name Email Address Phone Action
{d.name} {d.email} {d.address} {d.phone} ||
  • Previous
    • { numbers.map((n)=>(
  • {n}
    • )) }
) } export default Crud
